short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically find and apply coupon codes when you shop online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compatible With Your Device.

We have a huge collection of coupons for thousands of stores.

Be it buying your favourite smartphone, picking the best furniture for your home, or ordering your favourite food, add the CouponGini extension to Chrome, for huge savings and exclusive discounts.

Just Remember Our 3 Step Rule:


Step-1: Add the CouponGini extension to Chrome, with a single click. It takes seconds and is 100% Free.

Step-2:  Shop Like you always do. Just add products to your cart, while CouponGini finds the best coupons for you.

Step-3: CouponGini will list down all the working coupons for you, and you can choose the one you like for maximum savings.

Isn’t that amazing???

So, why waste more time, just a click and boom!! The extension is added to the Chrome browser.
